title: The Fall of Valoria
text: In the year 1243, the kingdom of Valoria fell to the invading forces of the Eastern Empire. The once-proud castle walls crumbled under the assault of the empire's siege engines, and King Aldric was forced to surrender after a three-month siege. The fall marked the end of the Valorian dynasty that had ruled the region for over three centuries.

title: The Code of Chivalry
text: The Code of Chivalry, as established by the Knights of the Silver Hand, consists of seven virtues: courage, justice, mercy, generosity, faith, nobility, and hope. Knights who break this code are stripped of their titles and banished from the realm. The most severe punishment is reserved for those who betray their liege lord, a crime punishable by death.

title: The Plague of Darkwater
text: The Plague of Darkwater swept through the coastal villages in 1312, claiming thousands of lives. The disease was characterized by dark spots on the skin and a high fever. Local healers discovered that a potion made from the rare moonflower could slow the disease's progress, though no true cure was ever found. The plague eventually burned itself out after claiming nearly a third of the population.
